comments.body:
The license file you had here before was correct, so please add:
```
license_file: LICENSE
license_family: MIT
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +35,39 @@  license_family: MIT
  summary: 'Cross Origin Resource Sharing ( CORS ) support for Flask'

  description: |
    A Flask extension for handling Cross Origin Resource Sharing (CORS), making cross-origin AJAX possible.

comments.body: In general, you don't need to have the `pname` variable. For the package name, you can actually use `name: {{ name|lower|replace("-", "_") }}`. This will lower the letters from `name` (Flask-Cors), and replace `-` with `_`.
